name: Running Errands
description:
This is a quest-based narrative game by Lambert Wu and Dylan Pangilinan. You explore a small quaint town running tasks and living your day to day life.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Action: Space
  • Shop Controls:
    • Buy: Enter
    • Exit: Backspace
